name: commercetools-node-variant-reassignment
description: Node.js utility which complements product sync/import process by automatic conflicts resolution and reassignment of variants from one product to another

scripts.build: npm run clean && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --optional runtime lib --out-dir dist
scripts.coverage: npm run lint && npm run build && LOG_LEVEL=info NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --full-trace -t 60000 --recursive spec/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test: npm run build && LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha --bail --full-trace -t 60000 --require babel-core/register --recursive spec/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha --bail --full-trace -t 60000 --require babel-core/register --recursive spec/integration/*.spec.js
